title: Best of The Herd: 06/03/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 06/03/2019
description:
Colin says that if the Raptors win the title it will come with an asterisk because the Warriors have so many injuries it’s become the Raptors vs. an MRI.  He explains where he was right and where he was wrong over the last week.  Plus, FS1 NBA Analyst Ric Bucher comes in studio and explains why he has a problem with nearly everything Colin has said the entire show.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
